survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Home Health Monitoring Devices Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes towards smart home health monitoring devices, including usage patterns, perceived benefits, and barriers to adoption.

questions.client_notes: Use a clear and concise question to gauge current usage. Avoid jargon to ensure all respondents understand the question.
